indications.source: STG Children & Adolescents, Tanzania 2017; STG and NEML Tanzania 2021
indications.notes: Neonatal dosing: 10 mg/kg/dose [Guideline for Neonatal Care, Tz 2019]

importantNotes: Maximum daily dose: 4000 mg/day (up to 4 times/day)

neonate.specialInstructions: Use 10 mg/kg (NOT 15 mg/kg) for neonates. Source: Guideline for Neonatal Care, Tz 2019

overdoseWarning.title: ⚠️ Can be dangerous in overdose!
overdoseWarning.definition: Overdose = more than 150 mg/kg as single dose

actions: Give activated charcoal OR induce vomiting

management.administration: Dilute to 5% solution with juice/carbonated drink (bad taste)
notes: If vomiting within 60 minutes → repeat dose
Most effective within 8 hours of overdose

dosing: - Loading: 150 mg/kg in 3 ml/kg 5% glucose over 15 min
- Then: 50 mg/kg in 7 ml/kg 5% glucose over 4 hours
- Then: 100 mg/kg in 14 ml/kg 5% glucose over 16 hours
notes: Continue acetylcysteine if late presentation or elevated liver enzymes
management.source: WHO Pocket Book of Hospital Care for Children 2013
